MIT Dog Swim is our opportunity to open up a swim event...
...for our four-legged friends in the MIT and extended community.
I like the fact that we're doing something different...
...other than the standard swimming leagues of the pool...
I think it's really cool that they offer this, especially in the winter.
I'm a little jealous I don't get to go in,...
...but I think it's a really, really neat opportunity for the dogs.
I can't lie; this is the best day at any job I've ever had.
